node.name: GoBuster / ffuf
node.rich_text:
GoBuster and ffuf brute force many common webpage extensions to try to find hidden sites
GoBuster syntax: $ gobuster dir -u

-w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/common.txt gobsuter calls the gobuster tool, dir specifies a directory attack, -w specifies the use of a wordlist, path to wordlist
200 means request was approved 403 indicates access forbidden 301 indicates a redirection
